rules.description: Mouse keys Ambidextrous (with H alias for left)
Function keys work as fn keys for the applications (Rider)
' to ä and ⌥ä to ' and ⇧⌥ä to Ä with conditions
[ to ü and ⌥ü to [ and ⇧⌥ü to Ü with conditions
; to ö and ⌥ö to ; and ⇧⌥ö to Ö with conditions

manipulators.description: Hyper Key + h: vim movement left
Hyper Key + j: vim movement down
Hyper Key + k: vim movement up
Hyper Key + l: vim movement right
Window: toggle AeroSpace window floating / tiling mode
Rider: Close Project (W for MacOS global hide, Hyper + Q is somehow blocked by the system)
Rider: Open in External Terminal -> Open current file location in the external terminal
Rider: External Terminal -> Open the project directory in the external terminal
